name: Brinda
wishText: May you have a great day ahead!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. Also Fioni sent the photo and she asked me to put this here.
